data.title: Great food!
data.text: On our way to Rainbow Springs Park and found this place to eat lunch at. Love their selection of food. Very different than typical place. I loved the Turkey Pita sandwich. They have a couple of tables outside, so our dogs could sit with us. Store has nice things also. Wonderful atmosphere here. Will definitely eat here again if we're ever passing Ocala again.

data.title: Fun atmosphere, great food
data.text: I went here with some friends for lunch on a Saturday. We had been in the store before, but this was the first time we ate here.  You order at the counter, and the food is delivered to your table when it's ready.  Two of us got artichoke flatbreads.  They had olives and sundries tomatoes on a perfectly crisp crust. One of us got a salad that was more like a lovely antipasto. This place is so different from anything else in Ocala, and I can't wait to go back.

data.title: a little gem
data.text:
What a great, unique place for lunch! The menu choices are different and delicious.
While you are waiting for your food, enjoy wonderful array of kitchen  "stuff".  I love this place.

data.title: Very Sweet
data.text: This will add pounds to your body but smiles to your face and make your mouth sing.. The desserts here to take home will make the whole family happy

data.title: FUN! FUN! FUN!
data.text: After a magnificent experience at The Appleton Museum and a delectable lunch at The Braised Onion, we wanted to show our friends one of the coolest little shops we have found in Ocala.  From the awesome wine selections to the overwhelming variety of kitchen gadgets to the great grill food (eaten on previous visits) this is definitely a 'go-to' destination.  The staff is accommodating and eager to please and Lee, the wine guy is super knowledgeable and helpful. They have a deli case full of yummy take out foods like salami, olives, cheeses.  Just a fun place!

data.title: Lunch after thrifting
data.text: Stopped in for lunch.  I had a delicious vegetable sandwich on ciabatta bread with a bean salad.  My companion had the chicken salad.  We both enjoyed a raspberry wheat pastry.   They also serve pressed coffee.   Wonderful cafe with wine and other treats for sale.   A group of us will be visiting at the end of September.

owner_response.author: Curiosity12, Manager at Stella's Modern Pantry, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind words and patronage, looking forward to your return
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Side trip in Ocala
data.text: Beautiful store that you could lunch at, many shopping & gift options available. Deli. Great wine selection. Casual for any time of the day.

data.title: Stella!
data.text: Love this little place, it's a go to place for lunch. I usually get a sandwich on gluten free bread. If you need a custom sandwich due to allergies they accommodate. Drinks in the cooler are different and fun to try. And while you wait for your sandwich you might look for a new kitchen gadget or a gift for someone that loves to cook. Love this place. Oh, try the desserts! Yum.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: Delicious food and great atmosphere. First time here for lunch and will be returning with my husband for dinner!

data.title: FANTASTIC!
data.text: Stella's is my favorite go to place Downtown Ocala for fresh salads, flatbreads, and of course, their exquisite desserts by resident and famous Pastry Chef Albert Barrett!  His chocolate mouse alone is my husband's favorite.  They sell a wonderful selection of wine, international foods, and offer up items in their cooler.  Water is served in glass bottles from which you can pour.  It is a great place to enjoy a light meal and one or two delicious desserts.  Such a great little place!

data.title: Quirky place for lunch
data.text: Very good sandwiches plus very tasty side of garbonza bean salad.  Have a small deli counter of Italian meats and cheeses.  Salami, proscuitto, capacola and provolone cheese by the lb. were very good.  Creme brulee was excellent,  other desserts were a little stale. Good service.

data.title: Gluten Free and Gourmet!
data.text: Food was so good I forgot to take pictures!  GF Flatbreads, GF Chicken salad sandwich....wine too. But it is also a kitchen pantry and has special items to buy for cooking. Fun idea and a double Pokemon stop!

data.title: Irresistible
data.text:
In our house we call this the naughty place! Dieters are just not allowed through the door! Love your body and allow it that chocolate heaven delight of cakefulness. 
Stella's also has an excellent selection of wines, wonderful staff, great salads, and is one of the best places in Ocala hands down. 
It may be small but totally amazing.

data.title: Delicious desserts and cool kitchen gear right in downtown Ocala.
data.text: Stella's is a cute little storefront right on Broadway in downtown Ocala. They provide delicious cuisine options for lunch and dessert as well as specialized kitchen accessories and other fun gift items. They've got wine and beer options too but being not much of a drinker myself, I always opt for the huge variety of "designer" sodas in their freezer. Sprecher Root Beer being one favorite, though they got rid of the Sprecher Cherry Coke which was TO DIE FOR! Try Stella's downtown for a lovely experience. :)

data.title: Amazing Stella's Modern Pantry!
data.text: This is fantastic!  Whenever I have friends over and I need to take something to a friend, I always go to Stella's.  It is just awesome and fairly priced.  Love it!

data.title: If you love kitchen accessories and good food you will love this place
data.text: Excellent food and specialty coffee's served up in awesome mugs and glasses and is very well stocked with gadgets and speciatly items to enhance every meal you prepare

data.title: Not just another restaurant in downtown Ocala.
data.text: Downtown Ocala has the cities best restaurants. Stella's is one of those. At Stella's, I love to look at the many choice desserts which are truly delicious & pretty special to look at. Nothing simple about all the sandwiches.They are fantastic as are the desserts. You may think you are walking into a Bed Bath & Beyond. You walk in through many interesting & unique kitchenware items to get to the kitchenette. Showcased are the fresh luncheon items of the day. Nothing boring here. We be back.

data.title: A late lunch
data.text:
For the second time, Stella's has restored me.
  Ocala is often a town a visit briefly while visiting family. I discovered Stella's when seeking a reprieve from the endless chain restaurants elsewhere in town.
  This visit I had the harvest salad with shrimp. Featuring a healthy pile of locally grown goodness and crisp fresh shrimp cooked perfectly, this was a vegetable lovers delight and kept me sated long after I finished eating.
  Service here is great and friendly. Stella's is a wonderful restaurant in downtown Ocala.

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: Whether Saturday crepes,  lunch,  coffee and pastry,  Stellas-The-Modern-Pantry is always good.   Staff's accommodating,  food choices varied,  and always diverse and interesting.   Excellent,  especially in Ocala.

data.title: A foodies paradise
data.text: Stella's was recommended to us for a snack during the afternoon. After a short visit I walked out with $80 of food and a couple of gadgets after having a perfectly prepared meat and cheese platter. This place is a mix of many cultures. The pastry chef is Jamaican, there are all kinds of ethnic foods to purchase and our snack was more Italian than anything else. So if you are looking for a place to grab a quick lunch or snack without going into a restaurant this is a great place to go.
